trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja is feeling the humidity.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Iq Rrax Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_000<tab>It is absolutely vital that we control excess humidity in our vegetable stores. We've been replacing the drying agents at frequent intervals, but sometimes we simply don't have any hands free for this seemingly never-ending task.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>Seeing our dilemma, a helpful hunter of the Brethren of Br'aax told us of a long-lasting moisture-absorbing material they make use of in the upper forest.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>It sounds to me like something we should try. Can I ask you to head up there and gather what we need?

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>The drying agent we made out of the materials you brought back is far superior to what we were using before. We've even taken to buying those same materials directly from the Brethren of Br'aax.

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>Unfortunately, however, the humidity under the Ja Tiika Heartland's canopy is so great that even this improved drying agent loses its effect all too quickly. Can I ask you to make another journey to the upper forest and gather more of what we need?
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>You should be able to find deposits of moisture-absorbing diatomite at the Xobr'it Cinderfield.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>You should be able to find a source of moisture-absorbing lumber at the Xobr'it Cinderfield.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>You should be able to fish up a moisture-absorbing mollusk from Iq Rrax Tsoly. Just make sure you have a supply of golden stonefly nymphs for bait.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>The diatomite deposits at the Xobr'it Cinderfield should provide a suitable drying agent.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>The moisture-absorbing lumber harvested at the Xobr'it Cinderfield should provide a suitable drying agent.

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>The moisture-absorbing mollusks caught from Iq Rrax Tsoly should provide a suitable drying agent. Be sure to take a supply of golden stonefly nymphs with you for bait.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>Hello, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how can I─ Oh, the drying agent! What do you have for me?
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Yes, this is exactly what the hunter was talking about. I'll put it to use immediately!

TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>Thanks to everyone's hard work, our harvests continue to grow ever more bountiful. But by the same token, we require ever more drying agents to maintain a dry environment for our growing stores of fresh produce.
TEXT_BANMAM123_05283_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>Without these materials you've gathered for us, we'd be in danger of waking up to a pantry of rotting vegetables...
